summary: Ported 8 Decidability files from old Metalogic/ to Metalogic_v2/ architecture. Created SignedFormula, Tableau, BranchClosure, Saturation, ProofExtraction, CountermodelExtraction, DecisionProcedure, Correctness, and hub Decidability.lean. Integrated with FMP for termination bounds via closureSizeOf and fmpBasedFuel. Lake build succeeds with 976 jobs.

artifacts.summary: Core types (Sign, SignedFormula, Branch) with Metalogic_v2 closure integration
Tableau expansion rules for TM bimodal logic
Tableau saturation with FMP-based fuel calculation
Proof term extraction from closed tableaux
Main decision procedure with three-phase algorithm
Hub module re-exporting all Decidability components
Implementation summary with file listing and verification results

next_steps: Review implementation summary and run tests. Consider completing remaining sorries in completeness proofs.
